sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 77-4001 to 77-4027 shall be known and may be cited as the Tobacco Products Tax Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1987, LB 730, § 1;Laws 2009, LB89, § 1;Laws 2023, LB727, § 88;Laws 2024, LB1204, § 25;Laws 2025, LB9, § 10.Operative Date: January 1, 2026
